properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: Base64-encoded secret key used for JWT token signing and verification. Must be at least 256 bits (32 bytes) when decoded for HS256 algorithm. Can be overridden with JWT_SECRET environment variable.

properties.name: jwt.expiration-ms
properties.description: JWT token expiration time in milliseconds. Default is 86400000ms (24 hours). Can be overridden with JWT_EXPIRATION environment variable.

properties.name: jwt.issuer
properties.description: JWT token issuer claim (iss) that identifies the principal that issued the JWT. Can be overridden with JWT_ISSUER environment variable.

properties.name: jwt.refresh-expiration-ms
properties.description: JWT refresh token expiration time in milliseconds. Default is 604800000ms (7 days). Can be overridden with JWT_REFRESH_EXPIRATION environment variable.
